text: Abo bangazanga baye (kwidabi laseTabuk) babevuya ngokushiyeka kwabo kuMthunywa ka-Allâh; babekuthiyile ukuzabalaza nokulwa ngezinto zabo nobomi babo eNdleleni ka-Allâh, yaye babesithi: “Musani ukuya phambili kobu bushushu bungaka.” Yithi: “UMlilo wesiHogo utshisa ngaphezulu (kunoku) ukuba bebeqonda.”
